name: The Crypt Caster
description:
The Crypt Caster is a roguelite, turn-based game with a twist. 
You must type magic words in order to create spells to defeat your foes!

Collect new words as you progress between randomized battles, type them at the right order to conjure different spells and effects, but...
Be aware of enemie's elements, because every element brings advantages and disadvantages to any attack.

Just to have some nice bullet points:

  • 18 different words to learn;
  • A single word can change de outcome of the spell;
  • Eye-catching effects! (｡◕‿◕｡)
  • Think and type fast before your breath ends and your turn is over;
  • Currently, 3 types of enemies (with more to come);

Note: this project is under development, please leave your suggestions to any aspect of the game in the comments below.
